Class XomUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.smartfrog.services.xml.utils.XomUtils

public class XomUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Generic static Xom utils; all java1.4+ The class has a protected constructor to allow direct subclasses

Save Xom to a buffer

Parameters:

Returns:
the document serialized to a byte array
Throws:
java.io.IOException - in very unlikely circumstaances

detachRootElement

public static nu.xom.Element detachRootElement(nu.xom.Document document)
detatch the root element from the doc, so it can be used elsewhere. The doc is left with a dummy element to avoid it being malformed.

Parameters:
document - the document to detach from
Returns:
element that was the root

base64Encode

public static java.lang.String base64Encode(byte[] payload)
Use the sun.misc codec to base-64 encode something. This ties us to Sun java, but removes a dependency on commons.codec or Xerces internal operations.

Parameters:
payload - the data to encode
Returns:
a base 64 encoded file

base64Encode

public static java.lang.String base64Encode(nu.xom.Document document)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
Save a document to a buffer then base-64 encode it to a string

Parameters:
document - the document to encode
Returns:
the encoded string.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if serialization went horribly wrong

Decode base 64 conent to a byte array

Parameters:
encoded - the encodec content
Returns:
the decoded buffer
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if something went wrong decoding the string
